title: Episode 104: Can Positive Affirmations Improve Your Self Esteem?
description: Can positive affirmations really help raise your self esteem?  People use daily affirmations and money affirmations to help them feel more confident, build their self-esteem and bring positive events into their lives.  But do they really work?  If not, then what will?
content:encoded: Can positive affirmations really help raise your self esteem?  People use daily affirmations and money affirmations to help them feel more confident, build their self-esteem and bring positive events into their lives.  But do they really work?  If not, then what will?
